Completed projects:

Movies' Blog

Technologies:

Web blog that shows the best movies in my opinion. It has two screens: Home and Admin. In the Home screen you can visualize the content of each movie; Admin has the same functions as Home but adds the ability to create, modify and delete movies.

Sonic CSS

Technologies:

Recreation of Sonic running in "Green Hills Zone 1", using only CSS and HTML.

Calculator

Technologies:

Calculator that uses addition, subtraction, multiplication and division functions. The purpose of making it was to learn how to do testing with Vitest. The calculator is simple and allows only one operation at a time.

In production:

SABTE

  • Facilitating the hiring of informal jobs
  • Platform available as website and mobile application
Project developed to create a platform to facilitate the hiring of employees who have informal jobs. Designed for Guatemala, currently developed by a team of 5 people.
